title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp: Zero to Hero
description: Learn modern web development by building real projects with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Perfect for beginners aiming for a tech career.
syllabus: HTML, CSS, and responsive design fundamentals
learningOutcomes: Build and deploy full-stack web applications
Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces
Understand the complete web development lifecycle

title: Advanced React and State Management Masterclass
description: Master advanced React concepts including hooks, context, reducers, and state management libraries like Redux and Zustand for building scalable applications.
prerequisites: Intermediate JavaScript and basic React knowledge
syllabus: Advanced React hooks and custom hooks
Testing React components with Jest and React Testing Library

title: Vue.js 3 Complete Developer Guide
description: Learn Vue.js 3 from fundamentals to advanced concepts including Composition API, Vue Router, Vuex, and building real-world applications.
prerequisites: Basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript knowledge
syllabus: Building a complete project with Vue.js
learningOutcomes: Develop modern web applications with Vue.js
Build single-page applications with Vue Router

title: Progressive Web Apps Development
description: Learn to build Progressive Web Apps that work offline, load instantly, and provide a native app-like experience across all devices.
prerequisites: Intermediate JavaScript, HTML, and CSS knowledge
learningOutcomes: Build web applications that work offline

title: iOS App Development with Swift
description: Learn to build beautiful iOS applications using Swift programming language and Xcode. From basics to App Store deployment.
syllabus: UI development with Storyboards and SwiftUI
Navigation and data passing between screens
learningOutcomes: Build and deploy iOS applications to the App Store
Create intuitive user interfaces for iOS

title: Android Kotlin Developer Masterclass
description: Become a professional Android developer using Kotlin. Learn to build real apps with modern Android development practices.
syllabus: Android Studio and development environment setup
UI design with XML and Jetpack Compose
Publishing apps to Google Play Store

title: Cross-Platform Mobile Development with Flutter
description: Learn to build beautiful native mobile apps for iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart. One codebase for both platforms.
syllabus: Working with APIs and Firebase integration
App deployment for iOS and Android
learningOutcomes: Build native mobile apps for iOS and Android
Master Flutter framework and Dart programming

title: React Native - The Practical Guide
description: Learn to build native mobile apps for iOS and Android with React Native. Create real apps with reusable components and native features.
syllabus: App store deployment for iOS and Android
learningOutcomes: Build native mobile applications for both platforms
Integrate native device features in mobile apps
Deploy React Native apps to app stores

title: Data Science Professional Certificate

SQL and database management for data analysis
learningOutcomes: Analyze and visualize data using Python
Build machine learning models for predictions
Apply data science methodologies to solve business problems

Reproducible research and reporting with R Markdown

title: Big Data and Hadoop Ecosystem
description: Process and analyze massive datasets using Hadoop, Spark, and distributed computing frameworks. Learn industry-standard big data tools.

Convolutional neural networks for computer vision
